---
title: Posit Cloud
---

- Create a Posit Cloud account on [https://posit.cloud/](https://posit.cloud/).
- On Posit Cloud, click on the `New Project` button on the right and choose `New Rstudio Project`.
- On the `Terminal`[^posit-cloud-1], type the following to install the `dynr` package dependencies:

[^posit-cloud-1]: Look for the pane with the following `Console | Terminal | Background Jobs` and click `Terminal`.

```bash
wget https://raw.githubusercontent.com/jeksterslab/dynr-wiki/main/src/build-cloud.sh | bash
```

- On the `Terminal` type the following to install `dynr` from the `master`[^posit-cloud-install-1] GitHub branch:

[^posit-cloud-install-1]: To build the `arma` branch, replace `build-cloud-master.sh` with `build-cloud-arma.sh`

```bash
wget https://raw.githubusercontent.com/jeksterslab/dynr-wiki/main/src/build-cloud-master.sh | bash
```
